messages.content: You are a NuCore smart-home assistant. You convert the user’s request into one or more NuCore routines based on the provided DEVICE STRUCTURE.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: zFrontDoor
ID: ZY005_1
  ***Properties***
    Status [id=ST]
      Enum [uom id=11]
        Unlocked [0]
        Unlocked [0]
        Locked [100]
        Unknown [101]
        Jammed [102]
    Battery Level [id=BATLVL]
    Responding [id=ERR]
      Enum [uom id=25]
        True [0]
        False [1]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Lock [id=LOCK]
    Unlock [id=UNLOCK]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
    Query [id=QUERY]
    Set Time [id=SETTP]
    Set Configuration [id=CONFIG]
        Parameter 1: name=Parameter Number [id=NUM]
        Parameter 2: name=Parameter Value [id=VAL]
          Range 0 to 255 Unit 1 Byte (Unsigned) [uom id=107]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit 2 Bytes (Unsigned) [uom id=108]
          Range 0 to 4294967295 Unit 4 Bytes (Unsigned) [uom id=110]
          Range -128 to 127 Unit 1 Byte [uom id=111]
          Range -32768 to 32767 Unit 2 Byte [uom id=112]
          Range -2147483648 to 214748647 Unit 4 Byte [uom id=114]
    Write Changes [id=WDU]
***Device***

ID: n002_d073d5266731
Parent: LiFX Controller [ID: n002_lifxctl]
  ***Properties***
    WiFi Signal (RSSI/SNR) [id=GV0]
      Range -100 to 200 Unit Raw [uom id=56]
    Status [id=ST]
      Range 0 to 100 Unit % [uom id=51]
    Hue [id=GV1]
      Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Saturation [id=GV2]
      Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Brightness [id=GV3]
      Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Color Temperature [id=CLITEMP]
      Range 2500 to 9000 Unit Kelvin [uom id=26] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Transition time [id=RR]
      Range 0 to 540000 Unit millisecond [uom id=42] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Online [id=GV5]
      Enum [uom id=2]
        False [0]
        True [1]
    Uptime [id=GV6]
      Range 0 to 65535 Unit Hours [uom id=20]
    Infrared Brightness [id=GV7]
      Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
  ***Accept Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Off [id=DOF]
    Fast On [id=DFON]
    Fast Off [id=DFOF]
    Brighten [id=BRT]
    Dim [id=DIM]
    Fade Up [id=FDUP]
    Fade Down [id=FDDOWN]
    Fade Stop [id=FDSTOP]
    Query [id=QUERY]
    Set Color To [id=SET_COLOR]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Enum [uom id=25]
            Red [0]
            Orange [1]
            Yellow [2]
            Green [3]
            Cyan [4]
            Blue [5]
            Purple [6]
            Pink [7]
            White [8]
            Cold White [9]
            Warm White [10]

    Set Hue [id=SETH]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]

    Set Saturation [id=SETS]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Brightness [id=SETB]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Color Temperature [id=CLITEMP]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 2500 to 9000 Unit Kelvin [uom id=26] (step of 1 and precision of 1).

        Parameter 2: name=Saturation [id=S]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 3: name=Brightness [id=B]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 4: name=Color Temperature [id=K]
          Range 2500 to 9000 Unit Kelvin [uom id=26] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 5: name=Transition Time [id=D]
          Range 0 to 540000 Unit millisecond [uom id=42] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Set Infrared Brightness [id=SETIR]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    Run Waveform [id=WAVEFORM]
        Parameter 1: name=Hue [id=H]

        Parameter 2: name=Saturation [id=S]

        Parameter 4: name=Color Temperature [id=K]

        Parameter 5: name=Period [id=PE]
          Range 0 to 540000 Unit millisecond [uom id=42] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 6: name=Cycles [id=CY]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 7: name=Duty Cycle [id=DC]
          Range -32768 to 32768 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).

***Device***
Name: ZY 005 Access Control Alarm
ID: ZY005_306
Parent: zFrontDoor [ID: ZY005_1]
  ***Properties***
    Access Control [id=ALARM]
    User Number [id=USRNUM]
    V1 Alarm Type [id=GV10]
    V1 Alarm Level [id=GV11]
  ***Accept Commands***

USER QUERY: When the front door is manually unlocked after sunset, lock it automatically.
